title: "Can AI Make Economic Predictions by Reading the Newspaper?"
excerpt: "In a new study, a team led by Yale SOM researchers devised a way to distill the text of the Wall Street Journal into numerical indicators, which could help policymakers predict how the business cycle will unfold over the coming months and years."
